name: Gentle Fall [Demo]
description:
!! CONTENT WARNING [CLICK] !!

The following game contains disturbing themes, such as:

  • Death of Animals
  • Panic attacks
  • Non-con drug use
  • Psychological abuse
  • Stalking

It has been almost a year since you started your degree, and life has been monotonous since. You study, you eat, you sleep and you haven't made any friends yet. Everything feels excruciatingly ordinary... except for the feeling of being watched constantly.

(This demo includes content of the prologue + half of chapter 1. The full game will be free.)

> Personality choice (Direct or Shy)

> (In demo) 2.5k words (I guess)

> Genderless Mc

> Romantic or Platonic relationship option.

> (Planned) 2 Romantic ends, 2 Wrong ends and 1 Platonic end

Credits:

"Giant Wyrm" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License

"Decision" from "Frozen Silence" at Jamendo.com

Door open sfx from rivernile7 at freesound.org

Alarm sfx from ZyryTSounds at freesound.org

Bed sheets sfx from cmorris035 at freesound.org

> please tag me on twitter if you play the game! i would like to see! this is like, my very first game. Also there is no music, sorry. <
